introduction.purpose: to integrate 3 faculties databases providing a web interface for users to access and manage the integrated inventory
introduction.scope: the iufa application provides a web-based interface for users to access and manage the inventory

system_overview.description: a web-based application for managing university inventory

performance: learning time is between 2 to 4 hours
application is available at all working hours
security: all users are authenticated by username and password
permissions are assigned according to roles
usability: web interface uses clear and consistent terminology
application is easy to use for users with basic internet and office experience

software_interfaces: browsers like ie, firefox, chrome, opera or safari

constraints: permissions for each administrative level are predefined
level 0 has permission to create requests only
